content.rendered:
Directed by Karan Malhotra.

Written by Cliff Dorfman. Ekta Pathak Malhotra. Siddharth Singh. Garima Wahal. Anthony Tambakis. Siddharth-Garima.

Cast Akshay Kumar(David Fernandes). Sidharth Malhotra(Monty Fernandes). Jackie Shroff(Garson Fernandes (Gary)). Jacqueline Fernandez(Jenny David Fernandes). Meghan Jadhav(Teenage David). Shefali Shah(Maria Gary Fernandes (as Shefali Shetty)). Kiran Kumar(Peter Briganza). Ashutosh Rana(Paasha). Kulbhushan Kharbanda(Principal). Ashok Lokhande(Monty’s Coach). Raj Zutshi(Baaz Rawat (as Rajendranath Zutshi)). Roderick Harding(Judge (as Rod Herding)). Conan Stevens(Luca). Daniel Bernhardt(Max Potter). Kareena Kapoor(Mary). Ron Smoorenburg(Hammer). Zachary Coffin(Fight Medic). Shad Gaspard(Ronnie Cross). 

Languages Hindi. English.

Producers Somesh Shivraj Chounde. Deepak Dhar. Parth Dholakia. Hiroo Johar. Karan Johar. Apoorva Mehta. Sameer Rajendran. Sharic Sequeira. Prashant Shah.

Production Endemol Shine India. Kaizen Studio.
